header.title: Samediggi - Saamelaiskäräjät - Sámi National Day at Sámi Cultural Centre Sajos 6.2.2016

body.p: Sámi National Day at Sámi Cultural Centre Sajos 6.2.2016
Duodji shop open 10 a.m. – 5 p.m., Sámi library open 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
At 2 p.m. MU DOHKKA – Exhibition opening

The Sámi Children’s Cultural Centre opens exhibition MY DOHKKA, with the theme dolls and toys . The purpose is to show a variety of hand-made dolls, as well as the simplicity and ecological thinking of toys. The exhibition is organized in co-operation with Sámi Duodji Ry and Kautokeino Duodji Institute. The exhibition will be on display in Sajos from 6 th of February to 31 st of May 2016.
At 2.30 p.m. Children’s musical moment for the little ones/ Anna Näkkäläjärvi-Länsman
At 3.00 p.m. The best of Skábmagovat –films for children
At 7 p.m. Sámi National Day CLUB-EVENING

The Club-Evening starts with the Sámi short films, and after that continues with the performance of Sámi music students form the Sámi Education Institute. Evening culminates in the Finland´s qualifying joik competition for Sámi Grand Prix – music contest. Registrations to Sajos
You can buy the Sámi short films blu-ray, that is published in the Sámi National Day, at the Club-Evening!
The national day events at Sajos are free of charge. Please note that the age limit for Club-Evening is 18+.

p.em: Welcome to celebrate the Sámi Nationa Day together!

body.p: Organising the Sámi National Day: Sajos, Sámi Music Centre, Skábma Film Centre, Sámi Children’s Cultural Centre, Sámi Education Centre, Sámi Duodji and Restaurant Lyeme.
